# QuickDraw ML Project - Copilot Instructions

This is a machine learning project for training a CNN classifier on the QuickDraw dataset.

## Project Setup Completed

- ✅ Project structure created with data/, models/, notebooks/ directories
- ✅ Core Python modules initialized (dataset.py, train.py, predict.py)
- ✅ requirements.txt with all ML dependencies
- ✅ README.md with project documentation
- ✅ .gitignore configured for Python ML projects

## Key Files

- `src/dataset.py` - Data loading and preprocessing
- `src/train.py` - Model training
- `src/predict.py` - Inference
- `requirements.txt` - Dependencies

## Next Steps

1. Install dependencies: `pip install -r requirements.txt`
2. Download data using `src/dataset.py`
3. Train model using `src/train.py`
4. Make predictions using `src/predict.py`
